53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:When the people stand before Allah, the Lord of the worlds, each one of them would stand submerged into perspiration up to half of his ears, and there is no mention of the "day" in the hadith transmitted on the authority of Ibn Muthanni

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي صِفَةِ يَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ أَعَانَنَا اللَّهُ عَلَى أَهْوَالِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Description Of The Day Of Resurrection - May Allah Save Us From Its Terrors
